attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. Save over R70000 buying this 2021 CRV 1.5T Executive demo on a new one!! Comes with a standard warranty till 30/11/2026. Standard 5 year / 90,000km service plan included too. You got to come drive this car to appreciate it! With power at your feet, this car will cruise you to your destination in style. With Apple Car play integration, you can connect to the world while you drive. The world is yours behind the wheel of the CR-V, the fluid lines of the CR-V were designed not only to create a sleek and dynamic look but also to assist performance by channeling airflow, resulting in improved fuel economy. The CR-V has been built with safety in mind, with six airbags guaranteeing full protection in case of an emergency. Make it yours and book your test drive today!
Finance Available, Trade in's are Welcome and Delivery Nationwide.
